titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Afro-American Cultural Center at Yale Records Documenting Its 25th Anniversary Commemoration
Afro-American Cultural Center at Yale Records Documenting Its 25th Anniversary Commemoration
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:02

did.unittitle: Afro-American Cultural Center at Yale records documenting its 25th anniversary commemoration

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of program material and memorabilia produced by the Afro-American Cultural Center at Yale for their 25th anniversary program titled 25 Years at Yale and Counting: The Continuing Presence of Blacks at Yale.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 37 (YRG 37), Records of associations, institutes, centers, and organizations affiliated with Yale University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Afro-American Cultural Center at Yale Records Documenting its 25th Anniversary Commemoration (RU 176). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of program material and memorabilia produced by the Afro-American Cultural Center at Yale for their 25th anniversary program titled 25 Years at Yale and Counting: The Continuing Presence of Blacks at Yale.

did.unittitle: Afro-American Cultural Center at Yale Records Documenting Its 25th Anniversary Commemoration
25 Years and Counting: The Continuing Presence of Blacks at Yale information packets (2) and T-shirts (4)
